title: (FTP) Download/ upload files to your website from linux terminal
description: You may use the WordPress,defaultfile manager offered by the hosting provider or the famous ftp client filezilla , But if something went wrong and you are not able to access any of them , then you can use this method and and it's very simple to.     In this video we will see how to upload and download files from Linux terminal using the simple ftp command   Music By Drops of H2O ( The Filtered Water Treatment )" by J.Lang Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution (3.0)
